author: rhuijben
msg: Use scratch pool for a few allocations during construction of ra session
(svn_ra_serf__open): Pass uri to scratch pool. Update caller.

author: apalumbo
msg: copy recommender/quickstart to algorithms dir, rename to recommender-overview

author: rhuijben
msg: Resolve a minor memory leak against pre 1.5 servers when running update
(make_update_reporter): Allocate depth filter in the result pool instead

author: khmarbaise
msg: [MINVOKER-184] Implement IT in an other way.
Based on the suggestions of Robert Scholte and Olivier Lamy
the integration test now creates the folder during the test
instead of checking in the folder with the special characters.
This will prevent issues with versions control systems.
